scripts.docker:start: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml -f docker-compose.watch.yml up --build -d && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml -f docker-compose.watch.yml watch
scripts.docker:stop: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml -f docker-compose.watch.yml down
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:start
